async src.visualisation.dashboard_viz.extract_top_reviews(data, topic, sentiment)[source]

Extract reviews in the selected topic based on predicted sentiment probability.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.Dataframe) – dataframe

  • topic (str) – string of topic

  • sentiment (str) – sentiment (e.g ‘positive’ or ‘negative’)

Returns:

list of reviews sorted by sentiment probability in descending order

Return type:

topic_sliced (list)

Extracts top reviews based on predicted sentiment probability in the selected topic.

Parameters:

  • data (pd.Dataframe) – dataframe

  • topic (str) – string of topic

Returns:

dataframe consisting of review and predicted sentiment

Return type:

topic_sliced (pd.Dataframe)

src.visualisation.dashboard_viz.reformat_data(data)[source]

src.visualisation.visualise_topics module

src.visualisation.visualise_topics.get_top_words(corpus, custom_sw=[])[source]

Extract top words according to their tf-idf scores

Parameters:

  • corpus (list) – list

  • custom_sw (list) – list of custom stopwords

Returns:

dataframe consisting top words and

its tf-idf score in descending order

Return type:

dataframe (pd.Dataframe)

src.visualisation.visualise_topics.visualise_top_words(df, topics, specific=False, custom_sw=[], inc_size=False)[source]

Plots bar charts showing distribution of top words in each topic using the tf-idf scores.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.Dataframe) – dataframe

  • topics (list) – list of topics

  • specific (boolean) – If True, create plot for a selected topic. Else, for all topics in the list.

  • custom_sw (list) – list of custom stopwords

  • inc_size (boolean) – If True, update layout of fig. Defaults to False.

Returns:

plotly figure

Return type:

fig (graph object)
